title: 9 RP for RP ART
body:
This is my beautiful drawing, I need 9 rp for an emote.
It is Nunu vaping at a funeral. [Please Riot person](https://imageshack.com/i/poJHh5trp)

replies.body:
Yooooooo never knew Nunu was a vape-bro. good to know! 

Be sure to check that account for your RP, and refresh it if you don't see it immediately ^_^


P.S. Guessing this was for an emote? Which one did ya end up grabbing??

Your image makes me laugh for some reason...
{{sticker:galio-happy}}
